p: Compounds 42 and 43 (3.0 mg each) were separately dissolved in 2M HCl in a sealed vial and heated at 100 Â°C for 45 min. After cooling to room temperature and extraction with CHCl 3, the aqueous layer was repeatedly evaporated to dryness with the aid of MeCN. The residue, which showed positive optical rotation, was identified as glucose by TLC [ 90] upon comparison with an authentic sample of (+)-D-glucose.
